solution_line_template: Twice the money of Darwin is {multiplier_for_twice} * ${darwin_money} = ${<<{multiplier_for_twice}*{darwin_money}={twice_darwin_money}>>}{twice_darwin_money}.
The money that Mia have is ${mia_more_than_twice} + ${twice_darwin_money} = ${<<{mia_more_than_twice}+{twice_darwin_money}={mia_money}>>}{mia_money}.
